title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS] 沉浸于壮丽之中吧
txt_content:
1.jpg (65.83 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-28 14:05 上传






DIVE INTO GRANDEUR沉浸于壮丽之中吧Constructed by Crunchybag3229由Crunchybag3229建造

Featuring an enormous pool, Crunchybag3229’s stately manor lights up the night sky and is ready to host a glamorous gathering. A discreet hedge keeps the guests in and party crashers out. We look forward to getting our invite soon!Crunchybag3229的这个美丽庄园照亮了夜空——它的主要部分是一个巨大的游泳池，人们将会用它来开一场盛大的宴会！四周的安全篱笆墙把客人们保护在内，把那些会破坏派对的怪物们隔离在外。我们都很期待收到派对邀请！

Do you have a fantastic build you’re ready to show off? Feel free to send your screenshots (and a little information about your structure) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and you might see your work here.你准备好展示你的完美建筑了吗？那就请随意发一些建筑截图（并附上一些建筑的信息）到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net 然后你有可能会在这里看到你的作品哦！


原文作者：Nova Barlow发布时间：2020/4/23原文地址：https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/dive-grandeur翻译作者：Srar
